articles.title: Exclusive: Stalkerware apps Cocospy and Spyic are exposing phone data of millions of people - TechCrunch
articles.description: A bug in the Android and iPhone monitoring operations allows anyone to access private data exfiltrated from a victim's device.
articles.content: A security vulnerability in a pair of phone-monitoring apps is exposing the personal data of millions of people who have the apps unwittingly installed on their devices, according to a security resea… [+8245 chars]

articles.title: In India, Apple’s iPhone 16e faces stiff competition from older models - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple has brought the iPhone 16e to offer a more affordable option within the iPhone 16 lineup, targeting emerging markets including India.
articles.content: On Wednesday, Apple unveiled the iPhone 16e. The model replaces both the iPhone SE and iPhone 14 in the company’s lineup. The new handset is the least expensive member of the iPhone 16 lineup, aiming… [+4433 chars]
